name: jdhenry105
text: Oh we doin' this.

name: lordpretzel
text: I will assume, without reading any further strips, that this is a magical Mexican realism chopper.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, mshendry, apocowarg, karljw, The_Prophet, chagment, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, Jesler729, equinn2006, FancyRat, NDCaesar, Sargasm, Rincewind, luckypyjamas, lk, Fcannon, suprememongoose, Kelrith, magnificentpoof, alejandroadam, ge7243, Milo)

name: catachresis
text: Damn, man. It is a bit of a push towards the ridiculous, but there is so much good in it. Plus it is birthed out of the Mexican Magical Realist Product Line, which is pretty much the best idea to have been had by a person.

name: lawbot
text: I just realised it is the face of a luchador.

name: twohundredninety
text: It's one of my favorites. I really like all the Mexican magical realism strips, in fact.

name: lucid
text: I can't get enough of Lonis and the whole Mexican Magical realism stuff. The Brothers Syndicate is pretty neat, also. No problems with this arc from me.

name: rosie
text: Butters is so low-class, but he did inspire a great phrase, "That's such a Hunt's move, dude."

name: gormster
text: I used this on a lady and got a punch in the face. Thank you, close homophones.

name: arcibi
text: I like how the helicopter has a luchadore mask paint job

name: thommy_h
text:
That's how you know it's "hencho en Mexico".

It took me quite a while to get that, actually.

name: shutup_shutup
text: Wow!  I'd never put those two together.  Rad!

name: shutup_shutup
text: Wow!  I'd never put those two together.  Rad!

name: talix18
text: It looks a little like StrongBad.

name: overmedicated
text: Great, now I can only see the chopper with a big muscly arm superimposed by my brain.

name: wehavemagnums
text: No capitals for AKKOLADE this time around.

name: zem
text: Ray's line in the second panel gives this a 5

name: epicurus
text: When Ray and Butters are together their playa-speak intensifies to dangerous levels.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: cognac large. that is serious radioactive playa right there

name: heavymetaljesus
text: Who else was eagerly awaiting Roast Beef saying "Man R2 aint got no teleport beam, how you gonna say that.."

name: stuart
text: paNE L 3

name: _cheesekayke
text: Man what is with Butters' arm in panel 3?

name: fineoakstructure
text: it is perspective.

name: jackparsons
text:
alt-text:Commence Internet whining about how teleporters really work.

Unforch, there is wacky html-junk in the alt-text.

name: aghbar
text: I think the html-junk is all sayin' that the really is italicized.

name: saddestking
text: Actually, “ and ” are the open-quote and close-quote, respectively.  How teleporters "really" work.

name: saru
text: Well, they didn't have a teleporter of any sort in Star Wars, but in Star Trek, you couldn't really get into a teleport beam because it was moving through, I dunno, subspace or some crap. Shields would stop it though.

name: soticoto
text:
The Fly.

That'd be my best bet... strangely enough.

name: molesticide
text:
who calls a player in the tub

the guy who does not know that the player is in the tub

how could he

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I don't see why ray bitches, he calls from the tub all the time. Did you take my laundry?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it's different when you become the callee.

name: jbacardi
text: Anybody who prefers Hunt's to Heinz is just no good, I tell you. Present company excluded.

name: professorhazard
text: Ray, don't act like you don't cold own Airwolf. It is faster than any jet. Why the quality time with Butters?

name: gormster
text: Four dollars a gallon, yo. Just cos Ray lives large don't make him eco-stupid .

name: terribleman
text: He's just playing along, cold waiting for the opportune moment to make Butters look ridiculous to the Syndicate as revenge for the Magreaux dog.

name: deusoma
text: The cockpit windows looks suspiciously like those in Todd's van.

name: deusoma
text: Let's all just pretend I didn't put an 's' at the end of the word "look." There, that's better.

name: hrm
text: the water in the tub had this weird effect on me of being solid and geometric because it meets ray with a straight line.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
a Jello bath. or like those baths from that pretty regrettable 'did i just spend eighteen dollars on this' movie Wanted .

...though some bits were sorta funny. (the ATM's questions and the Keyboard Whack Spell-It)

name: diggidy
text: Ray's insult implies that he would be getting mad rutty with Butters' mom, if only both her eyes had worked.  And that's great.

name: killthelies
text: I would totally take a ride in the Luchacopter.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: but i would only eat in the Lunchacopter.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: fuselage all an eggshell...bacon for propellers.

name: atticusonline
text: butters is left-handed

name: puguglypress
text: The third panel is the most ridiculous thing I've ever seen in my entire life.
